articles.title: Barbie doll with Down's syndrome launched by Mattel - The Guardian
articles.description: Firm partnered with US charity and medical experts to create part of ‘most diverse and inclusive doll line’
articles.content:
Barbie is launching its first doll with Downs syndrome in an effort to help more children find a toy that represents them.
Mattel bosses said they wanted to bring out the doll to enable all children… [+3078 chars]

articles.content:
Grimes has invited musicians to clone her voice using Artificial Intelligence in order to create new songs.

articles.title: U2 announce dates for 'Achtung Baby: Live at Sphere' - NME
articles.description: U2 have announced the dates for 'Achtung Baby: Live At Sphere', their first shows for four years. They are the first band to play there.
articles.content:
U2 have confirmed the dates for a run of shows where they will play ‘Achtung Baby’ in full at the new Sphere in Las Vegas.
